body_html: From the error message, it looks like TensorFlow can't find the CUDA DLLs it needs to use your GPU. Make sure you've installed CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 5.1 and added the directories containing their DLLs to your %PATH% environment variable.
body_text: From the error message, it looks like TensorFlow can't find the CUDA DLLs it needs to use your GPU. Make sure you've installed CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 5.1 and added the directories containing their DLLs to your %PATH% environment variable.
body: From the error message, it looks like TensorFlow can't find the CUDA DLLs it needs to use your GPU. Make sure you've installed CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 5.1 and added the directories containing their DLLs to your `%PATH%` environment variable.
